Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The names of !nanni's mother and father and his grandparents. 1) See also The names of !nanni's brothers and sisters, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-3.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The names of !nanni's relations
